cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, you may tap two untapped legendary permanents you control. If you do, Orflaith’s Solemn Oath is fulfilled.
When Orflaith’s Solemn Oath is fulfilled, exile it and destroy target legendary creature, legendary enchantment, or planeswalker.

Exile target artifact or creature.
III — Destroy all artifact, creatures, and enchantments. Then return to the battlefield all permanents exiled with Empire’s End.

cards.rules_text: Exile target creature or planeswalker.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter and a haste counter on up to one target creature you control.
[-2]: Modified creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever a creature you control dies, if it had counters on it, create a token that’s a copy of it.”

cards.rules_text: Exile target planeswalker. Search its controller’s graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that planeswalker and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

cards.special_text:
Target player mills five cards, then exiles their graveyard.
III — Create a green and blue Elder Horror creature token with “This creature’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards each player owns in exile.”

You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
III — Search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If it was an Equipment card, you may attach it to target creature you control.

Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast until the end of your next turn.
III — Until end of turn, whenever you a cast a spell, create a token that’s a copy of target nonland permanent, except it’s an enchantment in addition to its other types.

Each player discards a card.
III — You may reveal a creature card with mana value 6 or less you own from outside the game and put it onto the battlefield.
